name: Local Warming (Berwan Güler, ITA_SRL, erlingdammandersen, AndersGron)
name_original: Local Warming (Berwan Güler, ITA_SRL, erlingdammandersen, AndersGron)
description: Game made during a game jam at our school. It was a group project of 4 guys and it's about melting the ice and survive the wrath of penguins.
